text: Richard Earl Thomas (born June 13, 1951) is an American actor. He was born in New York City. He acted in the leading role as author John-Boy Walton in the CBS drama The Waltons, for which he won one Emmy Award and received nominations for another Emmy Award and two Golden Globe Awards. He also starred in Stephen King's miniseries It and played Special Agent Frank Gaad on FX's spy thriller series The Americans. ==References== Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:1951 births Category:American child actors Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American television directors Category:American television producers Category:Living people Category:Actors from New York City
title: Richard Thomas (actor)
